Class EReaderControllerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • EReaderControllerTest

  • public class EReaderControllerTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a JUnit test class the tests every method/line in the controller, model, and book classes. Each test goes through certain situations that might be reached when any of the classes are changed or updated.
    Author:
    Jack Guerin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EReaderControllerTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TestAlreadyExistingBook()
      This tests if a book being added to the model already exists in its HashMap.
      void TestBeginningOfBookBounds()
      This tests the previous page method in order to check the bounds of the book in order to not go beyond the books size.
      void TestBookCurPage()
      This tests if the method in the book class that grabs the current page works.
      void TestBookNotFound()
      This tests the controllers method that checks if a file is not found of the given name to be opened.
      void TestChangeOfWordsOnPage()
      This tests the situation where an imported book has a smaller size of words than that will appear on a page, so the openBook method will change the number of words on a page.
      void TestContainsBook()
      This tests the method in the controller class that checks if a book is contained in the model.
      void TestDoesNotContainBook()
      This tests the method in the controller class that checks if a book is contained in the model.
      void TestEndOfBookBounds()
      This tests the next page method in order to check the bounds of the book in order to not go beyond the books size.
      void TestGetBook()
      This tests the controllers method that grabs a certain book from the model.
      void TestGetLibrary()
      This tests the controllers method that grabs the HashMap that represents the models library of books.
      void TestGetLines()
      This tests the controllers method that gets the ArrayList of lines from the current book in the model.
      void TestGetNext()
      This tests the controllers get next page method.
      void TestGetPrev()
      This tests the controllers get previous page method.
      void TestOpenFile()
      This tests the controllers method that opens a file that does exist.
      void TestProgress()
      This tests if the method that grabs a current books progress works.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
